${ModID}:ArtilleryCargo.NAME: Artillery Cargo
${ModID}:ArtilleryCargo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy.

${ModID}:Avalanche.NAME: Avalanche
${ModID}:Avalanche.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL snowpunk:Duplicate.

${ModID}:Better.NAME: Better
${ModID}:Better.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!Snowpunk:Info!|1= Innate. NL }At the start of your turn, Upgrade ALL cards in your hand.
${ModID}:Better.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!Snowpunk:Info!|1= Innate. NL }At the start of your turn and when you play this card, Upgrade ALL cards in your hand

${ModID}:BlackIce.NAME: Black Ice
${ModID}:BlackIce.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Apply [snowpunk:SnowIcon]{!M!|>0= + !M!} Vulnerable, Weak, and snowpunk:Chill.{!Snowpunk:Info!|0= NL Exhaust.}
${ModID}:BlackIce.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Apply [snowpunk:SnowIcon]{!M!|>0= + !M!} Vulnerable, Weak, and snowpunk:Chill to ALL enemies.{!Snowpunk:Info!|0= NL Exhaust.}

${ModID}:Blueprint.NAME: Blueprint
${ModID}:Blueprint.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Choose a card. NL Add a copy to your hand.{!Snowpunk:Info!|0= NL Exhaust.}
${ModID}:Blueprint.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Choose a card. NL Add a copy to your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn.{!Snowpunk:Info!|0= NL Exhaust.}

${ModID}:BoltShot.NAME: Bolt Shot
${ModID}:BoltShot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

${ModID}:BrassKnuckles.NAME: Brass Knuckles
${ModID}:BrassKnuckles.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Apply !M! snowpunk:Singe.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Apply !M! snowpunk:Chill.
Deal !D! damage 3 times. NL Apply !M! snowpunk:Singe.
Deal !D! damage 3 times. NL Apply !M! snowpunk:Chill.

${ModID}:BrassWave.NAME: Brass Wave
${ModID}:BrassWave.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! [snowpunk:GearIcon] .

${ModID}:Breakthrough.NAME: Breakthrough
${ModID}:Breakthrough.DESCRIPTION: {@@}The next {!M!|>1=!M! }card{!M!|>1=s} you play cost{!M!|1=s} 0 and snowpunk:Tinker{!M!|1=s} {!M!|1=itself|@=themselves}. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Breakthrough.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}The next {!M!|>1=!M! }card{!M!|>1=s} you play cost{!M!|1=s} 0 and snowpunk:Tinker{!M!|1=s} {!M!|1=itself|@=themselves}. NL snowpunk:Tinker this card.

${ModID}:BuckShot.NAME: Buck Shot
${ModID}:BuckShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage randomly dispersed to ALL enemies.
${ModID}:BuckShot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage randomly dispersed to ALL enemies. NL Applies !M! snowpunk:Singe on hit.

${ModID}:CandyCane.NAME: Candy Cane
${ModID}:CandyCane.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If target has !M! or less HP, remove it from combat.
${ModID}:CandyCane.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If target has !M! or less HP or is a Minion, remove it from combat.

${ModID}:Caroling.NAME: Caroling
${ModID}:Caroling.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !Snowpunk:M2! snowpunk:Holly. NL At the start of your turn, if you played no Attacks last turn, draw !M! {!M!|1=card|@=cards}.
${ModID}:Caroling.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Innate. NL Gain !Snowpunk:M2! snowpunk:Holly. NL At the start of your turn, if you played no Attacks last turn, draw !M! {!M!|1=card|@=cards}.

${ModID}:Cauterize.NAME: Cauterize
${ModID}:Cauterize.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Apply snowpunk:Singe equal to unblocked damage dealt.
${ModID}:Cauterize.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Apply snowpunk:Singe equal to unblocked damage dealt. NL Gain !M! snowpunk:Fireball{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:ChooChoo.NAME: Choo Choo
${ModID}:ChooChoo.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Play all snowpunk:Linked cards in your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:ChristmasCookies.NAME: Christmas Cookies
${ModID}:ChristmasCookies.DESCRIPTION: Increase snowpunk:Holiday Cheer by !M!. snowpunk:Christmas Spirit heals !Snowpunk:M2! additional HP.

${ModID}:ChuckTools.NAME: Chuck Parts
${ModID}:ChuckTools.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! snowpunk:Spare_Parts. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:ChuckTools.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! snowpunk:Spare_Parts. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:ChuggaChugga.NAME: Chugga Chugga
${ModID}:ChuggaChugga.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL snowpunk:Link two cards in your hand.

${ModID}:ColdWind.NAME: Cold Wind
${ModID}:ColdWind.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Apply !M! snowpunk:Chill{!Snowpunk:Info!|1= and !Snowpunk:M2! Weak} to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:ColdSnap.NAME: Cold Snap
${ModID}:ColdSnap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Ã— snowpunk:S damage and apply snowpunk:S snowpunk:Frostbite to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Krakatoa.NAME: Krakatoa
${ModID}:Krakatoa.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! snowpunk:Singe to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Condensation.NAME: Condensation
${ModID}:Condensation.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card snowpunk:Condenses, gain !M! Block.
${ModID}:Condensation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card snowpunk:Condenses, gain !M! Block. NL snowpunk:Condense a card.

${ModID}:Create.NAME: Create
${ModID}:Create.DESCRIPTION: snowpunk:Assemble a card with !M! effects. NL Gain !Snowpunk:Info! more options to choose from.

${ModID}:EmberForge.NAME: Ember Forge
${ModID}:EmberForge.DESCRIPTION: snowpunk:Heat your Energy. NL snowpunk:Hot cards cost 0. NL You no longer gain Energy at the start of your turn.
${ModID}:EmberForge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: snowpunk:Overheat your Energy. NL snowpunk:Hot cards cost 0. NL You no longer gain Energy at the start of your turn.

${ModID}:EngineOffload.NAME: Engine Offload
${ModID}:EngineOffload.DESCRIPTION: snowpunk:Condense ALL snowpunk:Evaporated cards. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:FireAndBrimstone.NAME: Fire and Brimstone
${ModID}:FireAndBrimstone.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !M! snowpunk:Fireball{!M!|>1=s}. NL Whenever a card snowpunk:Evaporates, apply !Snowpunk:M2! snowpunk:Singe to a random enemy.

${ModID}:Fireball.NAME: Fireball
${ModID}:Fireball.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! snowpunk:Singe.

${ModID}:Freezer.NAME: Freezer
${ModID}:Freezer.DESCRIPTION: {@@}snowpunk:Freeze {!M!|@=a|>1=!M!} card{!M!|>1=s}. NL Gain !Snowpunk:M2! snowpunk:Ice. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Gift.NAME: Gift
${ModID}:Gift.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of !M! random cards of any color to add to your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Gift.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of !M! random cards of any color to add to your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of !M! random cards of any color to add to your hand.
Choose 1 of !M! random cards of any color to add to your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn.

${ModID}:Hail.NAME: Hail
${ModID}:Hail.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage and apply snowpunk:S{!M!|>0= + !M!} snowpunk:Chill to a random enemy snowpunk:S{!M!|>0= + !M!} times.

${ModID}:Harder.NAME: Harder
${ModID}:Harder.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! snowpunk:Chill. NL If this kills an enemy, gain 1 snowpunk:Ice.

${ModID}:HeatTransfer.NAME: Heat Transfer
${ModID}:HeatTransfer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate NL snowpunk:Hot Attacks apply !M! snowpunk:Singe.

${ModID}:IceCube.NAME: Ice Cube
${ModID}:IceCube.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! snowpunk:Ice. NL Exhausts if snowpunk:Heated.

${ModID}:IceMirror.NAME: Ice Mirror
${ModID}:IceMirror.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !M! [#efc851]Ice[] [#efc851]Shards[] to your hand.

${ModID}:IceWall.NAME: Ice Wall
${ModID}:IceWall.DESCRIPTION: When you draw this card, gain 1 snowpunk:Ice.
${ModID}:IceWall.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When you draw or play this card, NL gain 1 snowpunk:Ice.

${ModID}:Invent.NAME: Invent
${ModID}:Invent.DESCRIPTION: Create a new card and permanently replace this one with it.

${ModID}:MadScience.NAME: Mad Science
${ModID}:MadScience.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, Upgrade !M! random card{!M!|>1=s} in your hand for the rest of combat.{@@}
${ModID}:MadScience.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play a card, Upgrade !M! random card{!M!|>1=s} in your hand for the rest of combat.{@@}

${ModID}:NutCracker.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage{!Snowpunk:M2!|>1= !Snowpunk:M2! times}. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

${ModID}:Overdrive.NAME: Overdrive
${ModID}:Overdrive.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card snowpunk:Evaporates, draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}{@@}.
${ModID}:Overdrive.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever a card snowpunk:Evaporates, draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}{@@}.

${ModID}:PiercingRound.NAME: Piercing Round
${ModID}:PiercingRound.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Ignores Block.

${ModID}:PolarExpress.NAME: Polar Express
${ModID}:PolarExpress.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Add !M! [#efc851]Hot[] [#efc851]Chocolates[] to your hand. NL Set Cost back to !Snowpunk:Info!.

${ModID}:PressureValves.NAME: Pressure Valves
${ModID}:PressureValves.DESCRIPTION: Card effects act as if you have !M! more snowpunk:Snowballs.
${ModID}:PressureValves.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Card effects act as if you have {@@}X{!M!|>0= + !M!} more snowpunk:Snowballs.

${ModID}:PressurizedBlast.NAME: Pressurized Blast
${ModID}:PressurizedBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

${ModID}:Resupply.NAME: Resupply
${ModID}:Resupply.DESCRIPTION: Draw [snowpunk:GearIcon]  cards and Upgrade them. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Scald.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! snowpunk:Singe{!Snowpunk:Info!|1= to ALL enemies}.
${ModID}:Scald.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage twice. NL Apply !M! snowpunk:Singe{!Snowpunk:Info!|1= to ALL enemies}.

${ModID}:ScrapShield.NAME: Scrap Shield
${ModID}:ScrapShield.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block. Whenever you are attacked this turn, gain !M! snowpunk:Spare_Part{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:ShovelEngine.NAME: Shovel Engine
${ModID}:ShovelEngine.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain [snowpunk:GearIcon]  snowpunk:Fireballs. NL Gain 1 [snowpunk:GearIcon] .

${ModID}:Singe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL snowpunk:Heat this card.
${ModID}:Singe.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! snowpunk:Singe. NL snowpunk:Heat this card.

${ModID}:Sledding.NAME: Sledding
${ModID}:Sledding.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Gain !B! Block for each enemy hit.

${ModID}:Smelt.NAME: Smelt
${ModID}:Smelt.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL snowpunk:Heat adjacent cards.

${ModID}:Snowblower.NAME: Snowblower
${ModID}:Snowblower.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy snowpunk:S times. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Snowblower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy snowpunk:S times.

${ModID}:Snowbowl.NAME: Snowbowl
${ModID}:Snowbowl.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! snowpunk:Chill to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:SnowFort.NAME: Snow Fort
${ModID}:SnowFort.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain !M! snowpunk:Snowballs.

${ModID}:Snowpunk.NAME: Snowpunk
${ModID}:Snowpunk.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Innate. NL [snowpunk:SnowIcon]  count as [snowpunk:GearIcon] . NL Gain !M! snowpunk:Snowball{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:Sproinket.NAME: Sproinket
${ModID}:Sproinket.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Gain !M! snowpunk:Spare_Parts. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:SteamBlast.NAME: Steam Blast
${ModID}:SteamBlast.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage twice. Gain !M! snowpunk:Steam.{!Snowpunk:Info!|0= NL snowpunk:Evaporate.}

${ModID}:SteamForm.NAME: Steam Form
${ModID}:SteamForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! snowpunk:Steam.

${ModID}:SteamTrain.NAME: Steam Train
${ModID}:SteamTrain.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! snowpunk:Steam.

${ModID}:TheEmperor.NAME: The Emperor
${ModID}:TheEmperor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times.

${ModID}:ThermalShock.NAME: Thermal Shock
${ModID}:ThermalShock.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Apply !M! snowpunk:Singe and !M! snowpunk:Chill to ALL enemies.{!Snowpunk:Info!|0= NL Exhaust.}

${ModID}:TheSnowman.NAME: The Snowman
${ModID}:TheSnowman.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL ALL cards become snowpunk:Frosty.

${ModID}:Think.NAME: Think
${ModID}:Think.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block. NL Upgrade {!M!|@=a card|>1= !M! cards} in your hand{!Snowpunk:M2!|>1= !Snowpunk:M2! times}.
${ModID}:Think.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL snowpunk:Tinker this card.

${ModID}:ThinkingChamber.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !Snowpunk:M2! snowpunk:Ice. NL Upgrade ALL cards in your hand.

${ModID}:TinkersHammer.NAME: Tinker's Hammer
${ModID}:TinkersHammer.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Upgrade {!M!|@=a card.|>1=!M! cards.}{!Location!|4,-2= NL Upon pickup, Upgrade a card in your deck.} NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:TrainStation.NAME: Train Station
${ModID}:TrainStation.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Choose a card. NL Add a copy to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.{!Snowpunk:Info!|0= NL Exhaust.}
${ModID}:TrainStation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Choose a card. NL Add a copy to your hand. It costs 0 this combat.{!Snowpunk:Info!|0= NL Exhaust.}

${ModID}:TrolleyForm.NAME: Trolley Form

${ModID}:TheCryogenizer.NAME: The Cryogenizer
${ModID}:TheCryogenizer.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! snowpunk:Frostbite. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:WaterTank.NAME: Water Tank
${ModID}:WaterTank.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !M! snowpunk:Water.{!Snowpunk:CardTemp!|<0= NL ( !M! snowpunk:Snowballs )|0= NL ( !M! Energy )|>0= NL ( !M! snowpunk:Steam )}

${ModID}:Wildfire.NAME: Wildfire
${ModID}:Wildfire.DESCRIPTION: {@@}At the start of your turn, gain !M! snowpunk:Fireball{!M!|>1=s} and lose !M! [E].
${ModID}:Wildfire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !Snowpunk:M2! snowpunk:Fireball{!Snowpunk:M2!|>1=s}. NL At the start of your turn, gain !M! snowpunk:Fireball{!M!|>1=s} and lose !M! [E].

${ModID}:Windup.NAME: Windup
${ModID}:Windup.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! [snowpunk:GearIcon] .

${ModID}:WinterStorm.NAME: Winter Storm
${ModID}:WinterStorm.DESCRIPTION: {@@}At the start of your turn, gain !M! snowpunk:Snowball{!M!|>1=s} and lose !M! [E].
${ModID}:WinterStorm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !Snowpunk:M2! snowpunk:Snowball{!Snowpunk:M2!|>1=s}. NL At the start of your turn, gain !M! snowpunk:Snowball{!M!|>1=s} and lose !M! [E].

${ModID}:KeywordManager.NAME: KeywordManager
${ModID}:KeywordManager.DESCRIPTION: Stores keywords that are added in other places for translations.
